_A_MULTISELECT_ORDERED_DESCRIPTION_: The component allows selecting multiple items with the ability to set their order. Supports sorting, deleting, and moving items within the list.
_A_MULTISELECT_ORDERED_PROPS_BTN_DELETE_: CSS class for the delete button of an item in the selected list.
Icon for the item delete button.
_A_MULTISELECT_ORDERED_PROPS_BTN_DOWN_CL: CSS class for the button to move an item closer to the end of the list.
_A_MULTISELECT_ORDERED_PROPS_BTN_DOWN_IC: Icon for the button to move an item closer to the end of the list.
_A_MULTISELECT_ORDERED_PROPS_BTN_GROUP_C: CSS class for the container of the control buttons for the selected item.
_A_MULTISELECT_ORDERED_PROPS_BTN_UP_CLAS: CSS class for the button to move an item closer to the beginning of the list.
_A_MULTISELECT_ORDERED_PROPS_BTN_UP_ICON: Icon for the button to move an item closer to the beginning of the list.
_A_MULTISELECT_ORDERED_PROPS_LIST_ITEM_C: CSS class for the list item of selected values.
